duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare and teach advanced language arts courses focused on problem solving and critical thinking.
Engage and manage small classes of high-achieving elementary, middle, or high school students.
Grade students’ tests and provide comprehensive feedback on writing assignments to help students improve their writing skills.
Meet with students and families, as needed, before or after class.
Substitute for classes from time to time (optional).

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in education or a humanities field (Teaching credential preferred)
